defaultCards.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Destroy the monster that destroyed this card.

defaultCards.name: Skull Guardian
defaultCards.description: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Novox's Prayer". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 7 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.

defaultCards.name: Skull Guardian
defaultCards.description: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Novox's Prayer". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 7 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand.

defaultCards.name: Bitron
defaultCards.description: A new species found in electronic space. There's not much information on it.

defaultCards.name: Marshmallon
defaultCards.description: Cannot be destroyed by battle. After damage calculation, if this card was attacked, and was face-down at the start of the Damage Step: The attacking player takes 1000 damage.

defaultCards.name: Marshmallon
defaultCards.description: Cannot be destroyed by battle. After damage calculation, if this card was attacked, and was face-down at the start of the Damage Step: The attacking player takes 1000 damage.

defaultCards.name: Alexandrite Dragon
defaultCards.description: Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery, along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not.

defaultCards.name: Herald of Creation
defaultCards.description: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Level 7 or higher monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

defaultCards.name: Exploder Dragon
defaultCards.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Destroy the monster that destroyed it. Neither player takes any battle damage from attacks involving this attacking card.

defaultCards.name: Exploder Dragon
defaultCards.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Destroy the monster that destroyed it. Neither player takes any battle damage from attacks involving this attacking card.

defaultCards.name: Warrior Dai Grepher
defaultCards.description: The warrior who can manipulate dragons. Nobody knows his mysterious past.

defaultCards.name: Dark Blade
defaultCards.description: They say he is a dragon-manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power.

defaultCards.name: Dark Blade
defaultCards.description: They say he is a dragon-manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power.

defaultCards.name: Wattaildragon
defaultCards.description:
Capable of indefinite flight. Attacks by wrapping its body with electricity and ramming into opponents.
IMPORTANT: Capturing the "Wattaildragon" is forbidden by the Ancient Rules and is a Level 6 offense, the minimum sentence for which is imprisonment for no less than 2500 heliocycles.

defaultCards.name: Terratiger, the Empowered Warrior
defaultCards.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your hand in Defense Position.

defaultCards.name: The Tricky
defaultCards.description: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card.

defaultCards.name: Spiral Serpent
defaultCards.description: When huge whirlpools lay cities asunder, it is the hunger of this sea serpent at work. No one has ever escaped its dreaded Spiral Wave to accurately describe the terror they experienced.

defaultCards.name: Command Knight
defaultCards.description: All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK. If you control another monster, monsters your opponent controls cannot target this card for an attack.

defaultCards.name: Magic Cylinder
defaultCards.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

defaultCards.name: Call of The Haunted
defaultCards.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

defaultCards.name: Terraforming
defaultCards.description: Add 1 Field Spell from your Deck to your hand.

defaultCards.name: Swords of Revealing Light
defaultCards.description: After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster, flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack.

defaultCards.name: Swords of Revealing Light
defaultCards.description: After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster, flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack.

defaultCards.name: Mystical space typhoon
defaultCards.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

defaultCards.name: Mystical space typhoon
defaultCards.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

defaultCards.name: Advanced Ritual Art
defaultCards.description: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any 1 Ritual Monster. You must also send Normal Monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal the Level of that Ritual Monster.

IMPORTANT: Capturing the "Wattaildragon" is forbidden by the Ancient Rules and is a Level 6 offense, the minimum sentence for which is imprisonment for no less than 2500 heliocycles.

mainDeck.name: Terratiger, the Empowered Warrior
mainDeck.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your hand in Defense Position.

mainDeck.name: The Tricky
mainDeck.description: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card.

mainDeck.name: Spiral Serpent
mainDeck.description: When huge whirlpools lay cities asunder, it is the hunger of this sea serpent at work. No one has ever escaped its dreaded Spiral Wave to accurately describe the terror they experienced.

mainDeck.name: Command Knight
mainDeck.description: All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK. If you control another monster, monsters your opponent controls cannot target this card for an attack.

mainDeck.name: Magic Cylinder
mainDeck.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

mainDeck.name: Call of The Haunted
mainDeck.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

mainDeck.name: Terraforming
mainDeck.description: Add 1 Field Spell from your Deck to your hand.

sideDeck.name: Swords of Revealing Light
sideDeck.description: After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster, flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack.

sideDeck.name: Swords of Revealing Light
sideDeck.description: After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster, flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack.

sideDeck.name: Mystical space typhoon
sideDeck.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

sideDeck.name: Mystical space typhoon
sideDeck.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

sideDeck.name: Advanced Ritual Art
sideDeck.description: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any 1 Ritual Monster. You must also send Normal Monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal the Level of that Ritual Monster.
